medium: Cotton, silk; supplementary weft patterning, embroidery
title: Woman's blouse (Huipil)
description: Two-panel huipil; slit faced with commercial braid at neck opening; embroidered arm openings; wide red stripes alternating with bands of narrow brown and yellow stripes; supplementary weft patterning, stylized motifs in blue, green, purple, rose and white.
creditline: Gift of Elizabeth and Lloyd Olson in memory of Selma Groethe
